text: Ein Polterabend is an East German film. It was released in 1955. ==Cast== *Rolf Moebius as Adolf Glassbrenner ==External links== * Category:1955 films Category:1950s biographical films Category:1955 comedy films Category:German biographical films Category:German comedy films Category:East German films Category:German-language films Category:Films set in Berlin Category:Films set in the 1830s
title: Ein Polterabend
